subject: Parenting
title: Why Play Is Serious Work
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Why Play Is Serious Work.

hook.text: A child spends an hour building a block tower just to knock it down. Pointless? Hardly.

buildup.text: Play looks unproductive to adults because we measure learning by adult standards.

twist.text: Countries that replaced play with early academics saw no long-term gains and more behavioral problems.

climax.text: The American Academy of Pediatrics officially prescribes play as essential for healthy development.
